howItWorks.heading: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Three straightforward steps to create your perfect color palette.

items.title: Upload an Image
items.description: Drag and drop your image, or browse files to select one. Supports JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.

items.title: AI Processing
items.description: Our advanced AI analyzes the image and extracts dominant colors to formulate a cohesive palette.

items.title: Download Your Palette
items.description: Instantly preview your generated palette and download it for your design needs.

testimonial.heading: What Our Users Say

faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common queries about the Color Palette Generator

items.title: What formats can I upload?
items.description: You can upload images in JPG, PNG, or WebP formats to generate your color palette.

items.title: Can I use the palettes commercially?
items.description: Yes! Generated palettes can be used for personal and commercial projects without restrictions.

items.title: How many palettes can I generate?
items.description: There’s no limit! You can create as many palettes as you need. Enjoy unlimited creativity.

items.title: How secure is my uploaded image?
items.description: Your images are processed securely in your browser, ensuring complete privacy and no data storage.

footer.heading: Ready to Create Stunning Palettes?
footer.description: Try our AI Color Palette Generator now and elevate your designs. No sign-up required.
